title: Define System Requirements
description: Update the functional and non-functional requirements for the PersonalizedSummaryTailor system. The updated requirements should include user roles, input/output formats, performance expectations, security/privacy considerations, and potential integrations with existing systems. Consider edge cases and error handling mechanisms.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the high-level architecture of the system, including components for user management, document processing, summarization, personalization, and user interface.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration/deployment pipelines, and development tools.

title: Implement User Management
description: Implement the user management component, including user registration, authentication, and role management.

title: Implement Document Processing
description: Implement the document processing component, including document ingestion, parsing, and storage.
